ingredients.item: 1 tbsp Filippo Berio Mild & Light Olive Oil
Â½ x 750g pack frozen essential Waitrose Grilled Vegetable Mix
400g can essential Waitrose Kidney Beans, drained and rinsed

instructions.step: Heat the olive oil in a large frying pan and fry the vegetables for 2 minutes. Add the cajun seasoning and rice and cook for 1-2 minutes. Stir in the chopped tomatoes and kidney beans.
Gradually add the stock a little at a time and cook, loosely covered, for 20 minutes over a low heat until the rice is tender and the liquid has been absorbed. Serve immediately.
